page.title: 09Two Local Farms.
page.content:
{Warren House Farm.} It is an{arable}farm of{270 acres. {Mr.Clarke,who owns}the farm,has been there for 39 years.His father had the farm before{him.}The{buildings are 400 {years old}and he produces the following crops:{Sugar Beet, Barley, {Wheat & Potatoes.}He sells his Sugar Beet,which makes18 tonnes/acre, to The British Sugar{Corporation.}They employ{3 full}and{8 part-time}workers.
{Stubbs Hall Farm.} It is a mixed farm.Mr.Soar grows Oats,Wheat, Barley,{Sugar Beet, Peas {and Potatoes.He keeps 3,000 pigs, 250 {sheep and 300 cows.
